TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAction extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains an action on a specified resource.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> class corresponds the `<saml:Action>` XML element which is defined in the OASIS SAML v1.1 specification.
Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> class when specifying a claim about the ability of a subject <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> to perform a specified action on a specified resource. Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> class to specify the desired action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision> class to specify the access decision. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property represents that action and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property specifies the XML namespace in which the action is defined.
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> position in the SAML object hierarchy is:
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAssertion>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction>

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When using this constructor, to specify the desired namespace for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction> statement set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Namespace%2A> property. To specify the desired action, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction.Action%2A> property.
